text.tspan: Cone manuever, rectangular FOV => FOR is Conical
The green perimeter indicates the FOR
i.e. region within which grid-points can
Yaw180 manuever, rectangular FOV => FOR is mirrored
RollOnly manuever, Conical FOV => FOR is ~Rectangular
RollOnly manuever, rectangular FOV => FOR is Rectangular
The green perimeter indicates the FOR
i.e. region within the location can
The green perimeter indicates the FOR
i.e. region within the location can
and oriented in the Nadir direction
(the illustration would be similar for the case of CIRCULAR FOV)
about Y axis). There are potentially two
